title: Life Expectancy at Birth and at Age 65 by Local Areas in England and Wales
summary: Trends for England and Wales (national, regional and local areas) in the average number of years people will live beyond their current age measured by "period life expectancy".
metaDescription: Trends for England and Wales (national, regional and local areas) in the average number of years people will live beyond their current age measured by "period life expectancy".
